item.title: Help combining three ::commands into one
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:7, topic:293209”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffcmd") && (playerRights == 1)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); sendQuest("Test", ####); showInterface(####); flushOutStream(); sM("Welcome member of Staff"); }

Here so when a Staff type this you can write Mod, Admin & Owner commands in this.[/quote]

lol this is basically wat i was triyng to tell him to do

item.title: Help combining three ::commands into one
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

well simply im not sure how to combine it but like i get what you mean. you want it to show mod commands for the mods and admin commands for the admins am i right?? just simply change the name of the command such as

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("modcommands") && (playerRights == 1)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a mod."); }
but do this with the original commands code so you dont get errors. easy as that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help combining three ::commands into one
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

well when you type ::command it comes up with an interface with the list of the commands. I want it to be different when a mod and admin type it. So i want it to be like

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights == 1)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a mod."); else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights == 2)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a mod."); }
I get errors when i do this so im not quite sure how to arrange it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help combining three ::commands into one
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Can someone help me combine these three codes into one using if else or } else { i have tried like 10 different ways but i mess up on the playerRights part.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights == 1)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a mod."); } if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights == 2)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test2", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a Admin."); } if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights == 3)) { String name = command.substring(5); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Test3", 8145); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Congrats on being a Owner."); }

Read full topic
